## Submission Instructions

Upload your course paperwork as separate PDF documents to the Box using the below upload portal. Before you upload, save your files using the following naming conventions:

1. LastName_FirstName_Agreement.pdf

2. AICP Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct: LastName_FirstName_AICP.pdf

Where LastName is your surname (last name) and FirstName is your first name. Improperly named files will be considered not submitted.
